AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Add Provider Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: MIMED Batch Add Provider Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_UMHSBATCH_PROVIDER ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@BATCHID uniqueidentifier ,@SEQUENCE int = NULL -- Batch fields ,@PROVIDERID uniqueidentifier = null -- Primary Record ID ,@CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(50) = '' ,@UMEMPLID nvarchar(200) = '' ,@UMUNIQUENAME nvarchar(200) = '' ,@LASTNAME nvarchar(200) = '' ,@FIRSTNAME nvarchar(100) = '' ,@PHONE nvarchar(100) = '' ,@ADMITDOCTORIND bit = 0 ,@ATTENDDOCTORIND bit = 0 ,@RESIDENTDOCTORIND bit = 0 ,@CONSULTDOCTORIND bit = 0 ,@DEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@SUBDEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE datetime = null ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime
set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try
/* * Get constituent record for this Provider */ if @PROVIDERID is NOT NULL begin select @CONSTITUENTID=CONSTITUENTID from USR_UMHS_PROVIDERS where ID=@PROVIDERID end
/* * There isn't a matching/existing Provider, so see if there is an existing Constituent * record for the new Provider based on either the UMEMPLID and/or the UMUNIQUENAME. * If there isn't, then this could be a newly hired Provider that hasn't been brought into * DART via the HRMS import process. If this is the case, then the Commit will create a * shell Constituent record with the UMEMPLID and/or the UMUNIQUENAME assigned to the new * Constituent record. This allows the HRMS Import to find the new Constituent shell record * and update it with the imported HRMS data. */ if @CONSTITUENTID is NULL begin select @CONSTITUENTID = c.ID from constituent c inner join alternatelookupid a on a.CONSTITUENTID=c.ID inner join ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODE atc on atc.ID=a.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODEID where a.ALTERNATELOOKUPID=@UMEMPLID and atc.ID='97CE11D1-6793-47D5-9FEE-B54B90DA16DA' -- University of Michigan ID-UMID end
if @CONSTITUENTID is NULL begin select @CONSTITUENTID = c.ID from constituent c inner join alternatelookupid a on a.CONSTITUENTID=c.ID inner join ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODE atc on atc.ID=a.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODEID where a.ALTERNATELOOKUPID=@UMUNIQUENAME and atc.ID='4073AA02-1416-4F6F-9238-9FCEFDEE6423' -- U-M Uniqname end
-- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_UMHS_BATCH_PROVIDERS ( ID ,BATCHID ,SEQUENCE ,PROVIDERID ,CONSTITUENTID ,PROVIDERDRNUMBER ,UMEMPLID ,UMUNIQUENAME ,LASTNAME ,FIRSTNAME ,PHONE ,ADMITDOCTORIND ,ATTENDDOCTORIND ,RESIDENTDOCTORIND ,CONSULTDOCTORIND ,DEPARTMENTID ,SUBDEPARTMENTID ,UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE ,ADDEDBYID ,CHANGEDBYID ,DATEADDED ,DATECHANGED) values ( @ID ,@BATCHID ,@SEQUENCE ,@PROVIDERID ,@CONSTITUENTID ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER ,@UMEMPLID ,@UMUNIQUENAME ,@LASTNAME ,@FIRSTNAME ,@PHONE ,@ADMITDOCTORIND ,@ATTENDDOCTORIND ,@RESIDENTDOCTORIND ,@CONSULTDOCTORIND ,@DEPARTMENTID ,@SUBDEPARTMENTID ,@UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CURRENTDATE ,@CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0

FormField.Description: UMHSDATA Import of the Process Date.
FormField.Caption: UMHSDATA Import process date
